afterContactWorkTimeLimit.description: The After Call Work (ACW) timeout setting, in seconds. Minimum value of 0.

autoAccept.description: When Auto-Accept Call is enabled for an available agent, the agent connects to contacts automatically.

deskPhoneNumber.description: The phone number for the user's desk phone. Required if `phone_type` is set as `DESK_PHONE`.

phoneType.description: The phone type. Valid values are `DESK_PHONE` and `SOFT_PHONE`.
